reviews.title: Updates and binding
reviews.comment: I constantly have to bind my acct over and over and over. Its getting real old. Keeps resetting in game bases after I have beaten 90%. I have beaten. One base 6 times already. Building time are a little long. I\'ve had this game for months. And the reconnect prompt Is getting real old, or doesn\'t want to load initially,
reviews.author: raven whe

reviews.title: Just keep going
reviews.comment: Unless you play with a credit card this game is crap. It doesn\'t allow anyone who tries to play for free get anywhere in the game because it takes forever to build resources and you get attacked multiple times before you get enough stuff to do anything.
reviews.author: Alan Bridier

reviews.comment: Very good strategy game... needs some improvements to be the best.
reviews.author: Hassaan Hashmi

reviews.title: Lagging problem
reviews.comment: The game play is good and fun. However, it lags and freezes alot time to time.  Specially when many troops are in play.
reviews.author: sin kim

reviews.title: Tired of \'your error has been reported to us please reconnect\'.
reviews.comment: Sucks and error message when I try to look for someone to attack. Base name \"emperor changez.\" Fix the game or emperor will be unhappy.
reviews.author: k singh

reviews.title: Updates Extremely Buggy
reviews.comment: Game started out great but now the developers can\'t keep up with all the bugs coming out of the constant game updates.   Latest resource event update was fun until I couldn\'t play it anymore. Six days and four bug reports later, I get absolutely no help from Customer Service other than \'try reinstalling\' - gee, thanks I never thought of that.
reviews.author: Tom Druke

reviews.title: Unfair advantage for those p2w
reviews.comment: Pay to win is basically how people win. Very rarely do you encounter people who didn\'t buy their status with money. Pretty much has been revamped. No longer uses cartoon graphics. Gameplay is extremely micro transaction fueled. Only lvl 7+ VIP players can seem to beat me. Really? Spending $79 a month + a extra $80 for that VIP lvl 7? Gameplay is complete crap. No longer a game of strategically placing units and building up your base in time. Skip this game unless your a fan of spending money to win
reviews.author: ronald deasy
